level.heading: Conciliation agreements.
level.text: It shall be an unlawful discriminatory practice for a party to a conciliation agreement, made under the provisions of this chapter, to violate the terms of such agreement.

level.heading: History
level.text: (Dec. 13, 1977, D.C. Law 2-38, title II, ยง 263, 24 DCR 6038.)

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 2-38
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 2-38, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 2-1401.01.
